      • checkLocationSettings

        public PendingResult<LocationSettingsResult> checkLocationSettings(LostApiClient client,
                                                                   LocationSettingsRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: SettingsApi
        Checks if the relevant system settings are enabled on the device to carry out the desired location request.
        Specified by:
        checkLocationSettings in interface SettingsApi
        Parameters:
        client - Client which does not need to be connected at time of request.
        request - Location requirements.
        Returns:
        a PendingResult which can be used to check status of request and optionally resolve resolutions.
